## CircularDependencyDetector.registerComponent() method

Register a component and its dependencies

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerComponent(identifier: string, className: string, dependencies?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  identifier | string | The unique identifier for the component |
|  className | string | The name of the component class |
|  dependencies | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ An array of dependencies for the component |

**Returns:**

void
